013    package net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
018    import java.lang.reflect.Field;
019    import java.util.Collection;
020    import java.util.List;
021    
022    import javax.persistence.Basic;
023    import javax.persistence.Column;
024    import javax.persistence.GeneratedValue;
025    import javax.persistence.Lob;
026    import javax.persistence.ManyToMany;
027    import javax.persistence.ManyToOne;
028    import javax.persistence.OneToMany;
029    import javax.persistence.OneToOne;
030    import javax.persistence.Version;
031    
032    import net.sf.oval.Check;
033    import net.sf.oval.configuration.Configurer;
034    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ClassConfiguration;
035    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.ConstraintSetConfiguration;
036    import net.sf.oval.configuration.pojo.elements.FieldConfiguration;
037    import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck;
038    import net.sf.oval.constraint.LengthCheck;
039    import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck;
040    import net.sf.oval.constraint.RangeCheck;
041    
042    /**
043     * Constraints configurer that interprets certain EJB3 JPA annotations:
044     * <ul>
045     * <li>javax.persistence.Basic(optional=false)     => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck
046     * <li>javax.persistence.OneToOne(optional=false)  => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
047     * <li>javax.persistence.ManyToOne(optional=false) => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck, net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
048     * <li>javax.persistence.ManyToMany                => net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertValidCheck
049     * <li>javax.persistence.Column(nullable=false)    => net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNullCheck
050     * <li>javax.persistence.Column(length=5)          => net.sf.oval.constraint.LengthCheck
051     * </ul>
052     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
053     */
054    public class JPAAnnotationsConfigurer implements Configurer
055    {
056            private static final NotNullCheck NOT_NULL = new NotNullCheck();
057            private static final AssertValidCheck ASSERT_VALID = new AssertValidCheck();
058    
059            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
060            protected Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
061    
062            /**
063             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors
064             */
065            public Boolean getApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors()
066            {
067                    return applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
068            }
069    
070            /**
071             * {@inheritDoc}
072             */
073            public ClassConfiguration getClassConfiguration(final Class< ? > clazz)
074            {
075                    final ClassConfiguration config = new ClassConfiguration();
076                    config.type = clazz;
077                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
078                    config.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
079    
080                    /*
081                     * determine field checks
082                     */
083                    for (final Field field : config.type.getDeclaredFields())
084                    {
085                            final List<Check> checks = getCollectionFactory().createList(4);
086    
087                            // loop over all annotations of the current field
088                            for (final Annotation annotation : field.getAnnotations())
089                            {
090                                    if (annotation instanceof Basic)
091                                    {
092                                            initializeChecks((Basic) annotation, checks, field);
093                                    }
094                                    else if (annotation instanceof Column)
095                                    {
096                                            initializeChecks((Column) annotation, checks, field);
097                                    }
098                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToOne)
099                                    {
100                                            initializeChecks((OneToOne) annotation, checks, field);
101                                    }
102                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToOne)
103                                    {
104                                            initializeChecks((ManyToOne) annotation, checks, field);
105                                    }
106                                    else if (annotation instanceof ManyToMany)
107                                    {
108                                            initializeChecks((ManyToMany) annotation, checks, field);
109                                    }
110                                    else if (annotation instanceof OneToMany)
111                                    {
112                                            initializeChecks((OneToMany) annotation, checks, field);
113                                    }
114                            }
115                            if (checks.size() > 0)
116                            {
117                                    if (config.fieldConfigurations == null)
118                                    {
119                                            config.fieldConfigurations = getCollectionFactory().createSet(8);
120                                    }
121    
122                                    final FieldConfiguration fc = new FieldConfiguration();
123                                    fc.name = field.getName();
124                                    fc.checks = checks;
125                                    config.fieldConfigurations.add(fc);
126                            }
127                    }
128                    return config;
129            }
130    
131            /**
132             * {@inheritDoc}
133             */
134            public ConstraintSetConfiguration getConstraintSetConfiguration(final String constraintSetId)
135            {
136                    return null;
137            }
138    
139            protected void initializeChecks(final Basic annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
140            {
141                    assert annotation != null;
142                    assert checks != null;
143    
144                    if (!annotation.optional())
145                    {
146                            checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.NOT_NULL);
147                    }
148            }
149    
150            protected void initializeChecks(final Column annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
151            {
152                    assert annotation != null;
153                    assert checks != null;
154    
155                    /* If the value is generated (annotated with @GeneratedValue) it is allowed to be null 
156                     * before the entity has been persisted, same is true in case of optimistic locking
157                     * when a field is annotated with @Version.
158                     * Therefore and because of the fact that there is no generic way to determine if an entity 
159                     * has been persisted already, a not-null check will not be performed for such fields. 
160                     */
161                    if (!annotation.nullable() && !field.isAnnotationPresent(GeneratedValue.class)
162                                    && !field.isAnnotationPresent(Version.class))
163                    {
164                            checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.NOT_NULL);
165                    }
166    
167                    // only consider length parameter if @Lob is not present
168                    if (!field.isAnnotationPresent(Lob.class))
169                    {
170                            final LengthCheck lengthCheck = new LengthCheck();
171                            lengthCheck.setMax(annotation.length());
172                            checks.add(lengthCheck);
173                    }
174    
175                    // only consider precision/scale for numeric fields
176                    if (annotation.precision() > 0 && Number.class.isAssignableFrom(field.getType()))
177                    {
178                            /*
179                             * precision = 6, scale = 2  => -9999.99<=x<=9999.99
180                             * precision = 4, scale = 1  =>   -999.9<=x<=999.9
181                             */
182                            final RangeCheck rangeCheck = new RangeCheck();
183                            rangeCheck.setMax(Math.pow(10, annotation.precision() - annotation.scale())
184                                            - Math.pow(0.1, annotation.scale()));
185                            rangeCheck.setMin(-1 * rangeCheck.getMax());
186                            checks.add(rangeCheck);
187                    }
188            }
189    
190            protected void initializeChecks(final ManyToMany annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
191            {
192                    assert annotation != null;
193                    assert checks != null;
194    
195                    checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.ASSERT_VALID);
196            }
197    
198            protected void initializeChecks(final ManyToOne annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
199            {
200                    assert annotation != null;
201                    assert checks != null;
202    
203                    if (!annotation.optional())
204                    {
205                            checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.NOT_NULL);
206                    }
207                    checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.ASSERT_VALID);
208            }
209    
210            protected void initializeChecks(final OneToMany annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
211            {
212                    assert annotation != null;
213                    assert checks != null;
214    
215                    checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.ASSERT_VALID);
216            }
217    
218            protected void initializeChecks(final OneToOne annotation, final Collection<Check> checks, final Field field)
219            {
220                    assert annotation != null;
221                    assert checks != null;
222    
223                    if (!annotation.optional())
224                    {
225                            checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.NOT_NULL);
226                    }
227                    checks.add(JPAAnnotationsConfigurer.ASSERT_VALID);
228            }
229    
230            /**
231             * @return the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter
232             */
233            public Boolean isApplyFieldConstraintsToSetter()
234            {
235                    return applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
236            }
237    
238            /**
239             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors the applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors to set
240             */
241            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToConstructors(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors)
242            {
243                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors;
244            }
245    
246            /**
247             * @param applyFieldConstraintsToSetters the applyFieldConstraintsToSetter to set
248             */
249            public void setApplyFieldConstraintsToSetters(final Boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters)
250            {
251                    this.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = applyFieldConstraintsToSetters;
252            }
253    
254    }
